title: The Kafani Interview: Getting Shot & Paralyzed, Issues with DJ Vlad & More
description:
Kafani chops it up with Adam about his come up, Saweetie sampling his song, relationships with Keak da Sneak, Wack100, how he ended up being paralyzed and more!
https://www.instagram.com/kafani/
